attributes.action: Call a vote of no confidence in the labour government.
attributes.additional_details: Only 33.7% of the electorate voted for labour in the 2024 election, and their approval rating has dropped massively since then. Many people who did vote for labour are dissatisfied with the direction that labour is taking us in. I believe the UK  should have the opportunity to vote no confidence in this government and have a new election.
attributes.background: I would like parliament to call a vote of no confidence in the labour government. There are many constituents who believe the labour government is not acting in the best interests of the British people.

rejection.details:
We can't accept petitions about appointments, which includes calling for a vote of no confidence in the government.

You may wish to sign the following petition:

Call a General Election
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/700143
